requirements: Prerequisite: G&G 100, 110, or 115, or permission of instructor.
description:
Introduction to sedimentary rocks as paleoenvironmental archives. Reconstruction of depositional environments and paleoclimatic conditions using geochemical and sedimentological tools. Topics include sedimentology, stratigraphy, basin analysis, diagenesis, and sedimentary geochemistry.
Prerequisite: G&G 100, 110, or 115, or permission of instructor.
title: CANCELLED
